title: MacRabbit's Espresso Logo Font
content:
Hey there,

I just happened to stumble upon MacRabbit’s **[Espresso](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052632/http:/macrabbit.com/espresso/m)** preview website and have instantly fallen in love with the font of the “_Espresso_”. Does anyone know what typeface this is? I guess it’s not that hard to identify for a pro, but since I have absolutely no expertise on this I thought you might help me out here. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonti.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052632/http:/typophile.com/files/fonti.gif) | 5.66 KB |

 [‹ Sagrada Familia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052632/http:/typophile.com/node/49664 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bo concept sans? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025052632/http:/typophile.com/node/49686 "Go to next forum topic")
author: irina85

comments.content: Overall and since it’s a logo I would say it’s custom drawn.
Oh, the magic of Open Type ...

@Jan: Thank you for your quick reply.

@jazzhustler: AWESOME! You’re my hero of the day. Thanks a bunch, buddy! ;)
